original_title: Entire border wall to be painted black at president's request, says DHS lead | Fox News
article_summary: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem announced that the entire southern border wall will be painted black at President Trump's request, aiming to increase its effectiveness as a deterrent by making it harder to climb and more heat-absorbent. The move is part of the administration's efforts to enhance border security and reduce illegal immigration.</s>
